title: INV-010 CAPA Implementation: SDLC Prerequisite Gate Requirements

comment:
PRE-REVIEW COMPLETE - RECOMMEND FOR APPROVAL

**Frontmatter Verification:**
- title: 'INV-010 CAPA Implementation: SDLC Prerequisite Gate Requirements' - VERIFIED
- revision_summary: 'Initial draft' - VERIFIED (N/A for v0.x)

**Document Structure (SOP-002 Section 6):**
All 12 required sections present and properly structured:
1. Purpose - implements INV-010 CAPAs
2. Scope - Context references INV-010, Changes Summary, Files Affected
3. Current State - 3 statements describing procedural gaps
4. Proposed State - 3 statements describing target state
5. Change Description - detailed changes for SOP-006, SOP-002, TEMPLATE-CR
6. Justification - INV-010 compliance, process clarity, qualification integrity
7. Impact Assessment - Files, Documents, Other impacts
8. Testing Summary - 4 verification items
9. Implementation Plan - 3 phases (one per document)
10. Execution - 3 EIs with appropriate placeholders
11. Execution Summary - placeholder present
12. References - SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-006, INV-010, TEMPLATE-CR

**CAPA Traceability (INV-010):**
| CAPA | Description | CR-051 Coverage |
|------|-------------|-----------------|
| CAPA-001 | Update SOP-006 with RS/RTM prerequisite | Section 5.1 - ADDRESSED |
| CAPA-002 | Update TEMPLATE-CR with RTM approval EI | Section 5.3 - ADDRESSED |
| CAPA-003 | Update SOP-002 to reference SOP-006 | Section 5.2 - ADDRESSED |

All three INV-010 CAPAs are properly addressed.

**Current State Verification (Section 3):**
1. SOP-006 Section 7 has no CR closure prerequisite - VERIFIED (only 7.1, 7.2, 7.3 exist)
2. SOP-002 Section 7.3 lacks SDLC-specific requirement - VERIFIED
3. TEMPLATE-CR Phase 9.5 lacks explicit RTM EFFECTIVE verification - VERIFIED

**Proposed Changes Verification (Section 5):**
- SOP-006 Section 7.4: Well-structured, includes rationale, appropriate section number
- SOP-002 Section 7.3: Adds item 5 and updates QA verification list, cross-references SOP-006
- TEMPLATE-CR: Updates Phases 9.5 (add verification step) and 9.6 (add prerequisite note)

**Parent Document Status:**
- INV-010: IN_EXECUTION (v1.0) - VERIFIED appropriate for spawning child CR

**Placeholder Content Check:**
- Sections 1-9: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found
- Sections 10-11: Execution placeholders appropriate for pre-execution

**Typos/Errors:** None found
**Formatting:** Consistent throughout

RECOMMENDATION: Approve for pre-execution. CR properly implements all three INV-010 CAPAs with clear, traceable changes to SOP-006, SOP-002, and TEMPLATE-CR.
